author: Staff Reporter
text:
Inaugurated by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa through video conferencing

Collector R. Nanthagopal inspects the new office at Ambur on Tuesday.

The Ambur Taluk office has got a new building. Chief Minister Jayalalithaa inaugurated the building via video conferencing on Monday.

Collector R. Nanthagopal visited the building on Tuesday. He reviewed the ongoing works for capturing photographs for Aadhaar cards at the tahsildar office. Ambur Tahsildar Rathna was present. Earlier, the taluk office was functioning on Nethaji Road adjacent to the Government Hospital, Ambur.

The State government had allotted nearly Rs. 2 crore to construct a building for the taluk office.

A land was identified near Kannigapuram and the building was constructed.
title: Ambur taluk office gets new building
